casebody.data:
BILLINGS
v.
GENERAL PARTS, et al. No. 29P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 23, 2008. James A. Barnes, IV, Birmingham, AL, for General Parts, et al. E. Neil Morris, Sanford, for Billings.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 654 S.E.2d 254.

*667The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of January 2008 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of January 2008."
